headline: Broadridge Financial Solutions (NYSE:BR) Expands Leadership Roles to Enhance Platform Evolution
summary: Broadridge Financial Solutions (NYSE:BR) recently announced leadership changes, expanding roles to further its transition into a platform company, which comes as the company experienced a 1.21% price increase last week. This gain aligns with broader market trends as the major indices advanced, with the S&P 500 and Nasdaq showing resilience amid tech sector optimism and broader economic developments such as trade talks and fiscal policy discussions. Broadridge's removal from the Russell 1000...
